product_name: Benefit CosmeticsThey're Real! Magnet Extreme Lengthening Mascara
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingExtreme length with a magnetic force! Benefit's They're Real! Magnet is a 36-hour extreme lengthening & lifting mascara powered by magnetic technology to deliver 40% longer lashes!
details: DetailsBenefits36-hour extreme lengthening* mascaraFlexible, lightweight & builds easilyWon't smudge or flake*Instrumental test on 21 womenFeaturesBuilds 40% longer lashes**93% said it was extremely lengthening***95% said it lifts & lengthens lashes up & out***93% said it gives lashes fullness AND length****Than bare lashes - Instrumental test on 21 women***Self-evaluation by 110 women after 1 weekItem 2565347How To UseGently wiggle the wand from base of lashes to tips, layering to build extreme length & powerful lift.Allow a few seconds of drying time between coats to build the most extreme lash drama!Beauty Tip: Accentuate the extreme length by defining your eyes with Roller Liner Waterproof Liquid Eyeliner (sold separately). Draw a thin line along your lashes for a naturally polished look or wing it out for a sultry cat eye effect.IngredientsAqua (Water), Cera Alba (Beeswax), Paraffin, Polybutene, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Glyceryl Stearate, Acrylates Copolymer, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Steareth-21, Palmitic Acid, Pvp, Stearic Acid, Silica, Pentylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Steareth-2, Aminomethyl Propanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Panthenol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Aluminum Hydroxide, Tocopheryl Acetate, Disodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Polysorbate 60. [+/-: CI 19140 (Yellow 5, Yellow 5 Lake), CI 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), CI 77007 (Ultramarines), CI 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), CI 77288 (Chromium Oxide Greens), CI 77289 (Chromium Hydroxide Green), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77510 (Ferric Ferrocyanide, Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), CI 77742 (Manganese Violet), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a Benefit Product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently wiggle the wand from base of lashes to tips, layering to build extreme length & powerful lift.Allow a few seconds of drying time between coats to build the most extreme lash drama!Beauty Tip: Accentuate the extreme length by defining your eyes with Roller Liner Waterproof Liquid Eyeliner (sold separately). Draw a thin line along your lashes for a naturally polished look or wing it out for a sultry cat eye effect.
ingredients: please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use

reviews.headline: A must buy
reviews.comments: One of my favorite mascaras, separates lashes,  able to build up with out weighing down lashes.

reviews.headline: Smudgy!
reviews.comments: It goes on beautifully and i was really happy with the length and fullness of my lashes. Unfortunately it has smudged every time I've worn it. Within 4 hours of wear I had mascara all under the outside if my lower lash line. I had to throw it out.

reviews.headline: Love!!
reviews.comments: Excellent mascara, very buildable and doesn't clump. Lengthens well, too! I'm hooked!

reviews.headline: My GO to!
reviews.comments: My GO to mascara! Always stays on!

reviews.headline: my go to
reviews.comments: Purchased this several times. My favorite mascara. Great length and good volume.

reviews.headline: I wouldn't buy this product again.
reviews.comments: It smudged way to much

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again and again!
reviews.comments: I love the smaller size - easier to control and easier to travel with!

reviews.headline: Dry and terrible
reviews.comments: This mascara is terrible. It's dry amd does nothing for my lashes. Devastated i lost my reciept so I couldn't get a refund. Waste of money.

reviews.headline: Flakes Immediately
reviews.comments: Let me start by saying, I LOVE Benefit's other mascaras, in particular They're Real and Fan Fest. But this formula flaked IMMEDIATELY. I didn't even walk out the door and it was flaking.

reviews.headline: Horrible Raccoon Eyes
reviews.comments: This mascara did nothing for my lashes and on top of that left me looking like a raccoon before lunch.

reviews.headline: I wanted to love itâ€¦
reviews.comments: I really wanted this ti be my mascara for a long time but i can't deal with the smudging under the eye.  I'm not talking jusy a few flakes but full on raccoon!! Just not for me

reviews.headline: LOVE THIS MASCARA
reviews.comments: I love the regular mascara for years I have used it.. This one is Great!!! Goes on easy doesn't clump I will be buying this one from now on,

reviews.headline: Great Mascara!
reviews.comments: Clean mascara no eye irritation. Mask lashes  long love it

reviews.headline: This product actually sucks
reviews.comments: I genuinely cannot come up with one positive thing to say about this mascara. It doesnt add any length or curl. Lashes are stuck together, not separated. It has smudged under my eyes within 2 hours of application.

reviews.headline: Great lashes!!!!
reviews.comments: I have the tiny lashes but after using this mascara my lashes look great!!!

reviews.headline: It's nothing special
reviews.comments: It's lengthening and not clumpy or flakey. Really no cons, its just not worth the price point. Department store mascaras are just as good.

reviews.headline: New favorite Mascara!
reviews.comments: Just threw away an old tube, and was in the market for my new go to mascara. She did not disappoint. My lashes were long, no clumps & beautiful pigment. Trying to justify buying the volume, and waterproof ðŸ˜©

reviews.headline: Terrible
reviews.comments: Nothing at all special about this mascara. The regular They're Real is 1000 times better. Skip this one.

reviews.headline: I wouldn't buy again
reviews.comments: Blah, same as about any other brand.  Nothing at all special.  I have sensitivities to eye makeup.  This brand did not irritate my eyes at all, but provided nothing special in the way of length or volume

reviews.headline: Its alright..ðŸ˜¬
reviews.comments: By itself it doesnt really lift your lashes like the packaging claims it does, but its very buildable. I definitely recommend just getting the Theyre Real mascara than the magnet.

faceoff_positive.comments:
Benefit They're Real! Magnet Extreme Lengthening Mascara is different than any other mascara out there. It has a magnetically charged core in the brush, and the ingredients in the formula are attracted to the brush. This is science, people. The opening is smaller than it needs to be so that the brush is covered in just the right amount of product. No more having to wipe excess product off your mascara wand! This mascara took 4 years to develop and when I learned that Benefit had patented their magnetic technology I had very high expectations and let me tell you, Benefit They're Real! Magnet Extreme Lengthening Mascara did not disappoint in any way.
I first noticed the creatively located image of a magnet on the top of the wand, on a gorgeous silver tube. The shade is called "Supercharged Black" which is a fun play on the magnet theme going on here.
After I applied my eyeliner, shadow, my face makeup and combed my eyelashes, I was more than ready to try this mascara out. I wanted to see how it could benefit the look of my lashes. Wow! The bristles on here are placed perfectly, and it really did grasp every single lash very quickly. You can actually see the magnetic technology working! It usually takes me about 8 minutes to apply mascara, but while using Benefit They're Real! Magnet Extreme Length Mascara it took me half the time! (Yes, I really did use a timer to see how long it takes/took to apply mascara.) Usually I have a very difficult time applying mascara to my bottom lashes and I usually get the formula on my skin, but that did not happen with this mascara. It immediately picked up every tiny little lash and coated them just perfectly. My lashes look so pretty, a very flirty fanned out look, and definitely longer! The only thing this mascara doesn't do is make lashes look a lot thicker, but I don't think this mascara was created with that in mind. I believe their focus was on creating a very lengthening mascara that grabs each lash quickly and easily and they perfected that goal. No wonder they put a patent on it! I am charmed with this mascara in every way.
This is the mascara of the future.
I want to say thank you to Benefit cosmetics and thank you to Influenster for sending me this incredible mascara in return for my 100% honest review of my experience with it.
faceoff_positive.headline: The Mascara of the Future

faceoff_negative.comments:
Mascara is such a subjective product; different people have different lashes and lids and desire different effects. For that reason, I can't outright pan this mascara, but I was really disappointed that the formula didn't give me the results I look for. 

I have dark, straight lashes of varying lengths and density, fairly dry lids, and I go for a "My Face But Better" look when doing my makeup. My favorite mascaras tend to be 1) long-wearing tubing formulas that give my lashes a boost without being obvious 2) non-clumping, non-flaking formulas I can swipe on and forget about for the rest of the day, and 3) easy to remove with my regular micellar water at the end of the day.  

2 of my HG mascarasâ€”They're Real Tinted Primer and They're Real in shade Mink Brownâ€”are not only made by Benefit but *part of this mascara line*. I was really excited about this VoxBox, but They're Real MAGNET just missed the mark for me. 

I'm including photos for comparison, but the first thing I noticed was the wand. They're Real/Primer and even Roller Lash have thin, very flexible wands; however, the MAGNET wand is stiff and much thicker. You can tell it is meant to grab more product, and it does. The first time I used MAGNET, the product application was so thick and goopy I had to go back through my lashes with a clean wand to separate my lashes. Bit of a hassle, but they looked nice when I'd finished. A few hours later, I had to remove one of my contacts because something was in my eye: the culprit ended up being 2 big flecks of mascara :( I wrote it off as user error, and decided to scrape off the excess on the tube before use next time to avoid a repeat. I also made a note that the mascara didn't come off with Bioderma and my second cleanse that first evening. 

The second time I wore MAGNET, I scraped off the excess on the tube and applied carefully. The formula feels very thick, almost like dried out Roller Lash. I think this could give a volumizing effect, but it made my uneven length lashes clump together again. I separated them out with a lash tool but felt like I had spider-leg lashes. I was sweeping fallout from my undereyes all day but still had a hard time removing the mascara. If you oil-cleanse regularly, removal shouldn't be a problem (I just didn't have an oil or biphasic on hand and had to hunt one down). 

As with all mascaras, I'd recommend purchasing in travel size first to see if this works for you before committing to the full size. Benefit is awesome about making sample/travel sizes available and they last for several months with daily use. #VoxBox #Benefit #TheyreRealMAGNET #mascara
faceoff_negative.headline: Clumpy and flakey, hard to remove

rollup.name: They're Real! Magnet Extreme Lengthening Mascara
